Articles.Content:
I kept thinking that the PB-NUK nuclear reactor looked like the Dalek pew-pew beam, and, well, this is what happened:

![jurycn.png](http://a.pomf.se/jurycn.png)

And, yes, ELEVATE! ELEVATE! actually works. Just be sure to engage SAS, and don't mess with the the thrust limiters.

Download link: [http://a.pomf.se/vemmph.craft](http://a.pomf.se/vemmph.craft) (all stock parts)

\*Please note: Doctor not included. As the Daleks are the most dangerous race in the entire universe, use at own risk. Kagame is not liable for EXTERMINATEd planets, solar systems, or galaxies.\*
Can it drive around? Can I use it to blow up the administration building?

> 
> Can it drive around? Can I use it to blow up the administration building?

One could clip the tiny rover wheels inside of it...
Ooo, good idea. I'll get right on it.

Adding wheels didn't quite work out. The Dalek form is just too top-heavy in the KSP physics engine, even when I clipped in extra stuff in the bottom. (Did you know: Radial parachutes are one of the most dense objects in KSP). Even when I engaged SAS, it still didn't work... .\_. Oh well, cool idea anyways. Free cookie to anybody that can make it work.
